comment: The new ui update is a huge downgrade and really unecessary. I can no longer adjust the height of handwriting option and it doesn't show at all in split screen. Bring back the old version please it was much better than the new update.
key sentence: Adjust the height of the handwriting option.
the function of activity: The activity facilitates translation and navigation:Search, menu, navigate, history, handwriting, options, text entry, paste, language swap, and settings management for user interaction and feedback.
